name: Rénergie Triple Serum
usage: Anti-aging serum that targets firmness, wrinkles, and radiance. Apply morning and night.

name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Serum
usage: Oil-control and blemish-reducing serum. Use in the morning and evening before moisturizer.

name: Avocado Ceramide Redness Relief Serum
usage: Soothing serum formulated with ceramides and avocado to strengthen the skin barrier and reduce redness.

name: Advanced Night Repair Serum
usage: Comprehensive anti-aging serum that reduces multiple signs of aging. Apply on clean skin before moisturizer in the evening.

name: Double Serum Gen 9
usage: Complete age control concentrate that targets signs of aging. Apply morning and/or evening before your regular skincare.

name: Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops
usage: Brightening serum with niacinamide and watermelon extract for a dewy glow. Apply as the last step of skincare routine or as a primer before makeup.

name: Retinol 1% in Squalane
usage: High-strength retinol serum for reducing signs of aging. Apply a small amount in the evening after water-based serums before heavier treatments.

name: Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha Arbutin
usage: Brightening serum with rice extract and alpha arbutin to even out skin tone. Apply 2–3 drops to the skin and pat gently to aid absorption.

name: Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate
usage: Strengthening serum that enhances skin's defense against aging and daily damage. Apply morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturizing.

name: Glow Serum: Propolis + Niacinamide
usage: Soothing and pore-tightening serum with propolis and niacinamide. Apply 2–3 drops to the skin and pat gently to aid absorption.

name: Bouncy & Firm Serum
usage: Firming serum that enhances skin elasticity and bounce. Apply morning and evening before moisturizer.

name: Pomegranate Peptide Firming Serum
usage: Firming serum with pomegranate extract and peptides to improve skin elasticity. Apply morning and evening before moisturizer.

name: C-Firma™ Fresh Day Serum
usage: Vitamin C serum that brightens and firms the skin. Mix before first use and apply in the morning to clean, dry face.

name: Magic Serum Crystal Elixir
usage: Hydrating and glow-boosting serum with vitamin C and polyglutamic acid. Apply morning and evening before moisturizer.

name: Brightening Serum
usage: Radiance-boosting serum that evens out skin tone and brightens the complexion. Apply morning and/or evening before moisturizer.

name: Firming & Plumping Serum
usage: Plumping and firming serum that smooths fine lines and adds volume. Use morning and night before moisturizer.

name: B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum
usage: Intensely hydrating serum with provitamin B5 and pineapple ceramide. Apply daily to improve skin texture and radiance.

name: Strawberry Smooth BHA + AHA Serum
usage: Exfoliating and smoothing serum with salicylic and mandelic acid. Use at night 2–3 times a week after cleansing.

name: Calming Serum: Green Tea + Panthenol
usage: Soothing and hydrating serum with green tea extract and panthenol. Great for calming irritated skin.

name: Protini Powerpeptide Serum
usage: Powerful peptide-based serum that improves skin tone, texture, and firmness. Apply daily for smoother, brighter skin.

name: Plum Plump™ Hyaluronic Moisturizer
usage: Apply to clean face and neck morning and night for plump, hydrated skin.

name: Rénergie H.P.N. 300-Peptide Anti-Aging Cream
usage: Apply to face and neck morning and evening to reduce signs of aging and improve skin firmness.

name: Natural Moisturizing Factors + Beta Glucan
usage: Apply a small amount to face after serums as needed for hydration.

name: Moisturizing Gel Cream
usage: Apply to clean skin morning and night for lightweight hydration.

name: Protini™ Polypeptide Cream
usage: Apply to clean, dry skin morning and night to improve skin tone, texture, and firmness.

name: DayWear SPF 15 Creme
usage: Apply in the morning to clean skin to hydrate and protect against environmental damage.

name: Bora Barrier™ Repair Cream
usage: Apply as needed to clean, dry skin to strengthen and restore the skin barrier.

name: Extra-Firming Day Cream
usage: Apply every morning to clean face and neck to improve skin elasticity and firmness.

name: White Lucent Brightening Gel Cream
usage: Apply morning and evening to clean skin to brighten and even skin tone.

name: Rose Face Cream
usage: Apply to clean skin morning and night for deep hydration and nourishment.

name: Bouncy & Firm Sleeping Mask
usage: Apply as the last step of your nighttime routine. Leave on overnight and rinse off in the morning.

name: Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Night Cream
usage: Apply nightly to clean skin to deeply hydrate and plump the skin.

name: Ceramidin™ Moisturizing Cream
usage: Apply an appropriate amount to the face as the last step of your skincare routine, both morning and evening. Gently massage into the skin until fully absorbed.

name: The Moisturizing Fresh Cream
usage: Apply to clean, dry skin morning and night to deeply hydrate and rejuvenate the skin.

name: Super Hydratant Jour
usage: Apply in the morning to clean skin for all-day hydration and radiance.

name: Hydra-Essentiel [HA²] Moisturizer
usage: Apply morning and evening to clean skin to deeply hydrate and plump the skin.

name: Super Restorative Rose Radiance Cream
usage: Apply every morning to clean face and neck to boost radiance and firmness.

name: Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Cream
usage: Apply nightly to clean skin to reduce signs of aging and rejuvenate the skin.

name: Super Restorative Night Cream
usage: Apply every night to clean face and neck to deeply nourish and restore the skin.

name: Watermelon Glow Sleeping Mask
usage: Apply as the final step of your nighttime routine. Leave on overnight and rinse off in the morning.

name: 7% Glycolic Acid Peeling Toner
usage: Use once daily, preferably in the evening. Apply to face with a cotton pad after cleansing.

name: Glow Tonic
usage: Use AM and PM. Saturate a cotton pad and sweep across face, neck, and décolletage after cleansing.

name: Fat Water
usage: Use day and night on clean skin. Apply over face with fingers.

name: Clarifying Lotion 1.0
usage: Use twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.

name: Glow Replenishing Rice Milk
usage: After cleansing, apply an appropriate amount to the face and pat gently for absorption.

name: Toning Lotion
usage: Apply to clean skin using a cotton pad. Do not rinse.

name: Tea Tree Spray Toner
usage: Spray directly onto face after cleansing or throughout the day as needed.

name: Ginseng Essence Water
usage: After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount to face and neck. Pat gently until absorbed.

name: Tonique Confort
usage: Apply with a cotton pad to clean skin, morning and evening.

name: Bright Plus Freshness Lotion
usage: Apply to clean skin using a cotton pad. Use morning and evening.

name: Dermaclear Micro Foam Cleanser
usage: Apply a small amount to damp face and gently massage. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

name: Green Plum Refreshing Cleanser
usage: Apply a small amount to wet skin. Massage gently and rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use daily.

name: Liquid Facial Soap – Mild
usage: Lather between palms with tepid water. Massage over face and throat; rinse. Use twice a day.

name: Silky Purifying Cleansing Cream
usage: Apply to dry face and gently massage in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

name: Complete Cleansing Microfoam
usage: Dispense foam into palm and gently smooth over face. Rinse thoroughly with water.

name: Nutritious Cleanser – Foaming
usage: Apply morning and night to wet skin. Massage and rinse thoroughly.

name: Ginseng Cleansing Oil
usage: Apply to dry face and gently massage. Add water to emulsify and rinse thoroughly.

name: Smoothing Cleanser Exfoliates & Shine Gel
usage: Use daily on wet face. Massage gently and rinse thoroughly.

name: Oat Cleansing Balm
usage: Massage a small amount onto damp face and rinse with warm water. Suitable for daily use.

name: Creamy Jelly Cleanser
usage: Apply to wet skin, massage gently in circular motions, and rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

name: 2% Salicylic Acid Mask
usage: Apply evenly to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use once or twice a week.

name: Deep Purifying Mask
usage: Apply a generous layer to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 5–10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with water. Use 1–2 times per week.

name: All About Clean 2-in-1 Cleansing + Exfoliating Jelly
usage: Use twice daily. Apply to damp skin, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Cicapair™ Tiger Grass Sleepair Intensive Mask
usage: Apply as the last step of your nighttime skincare routine. Leave on overnight and rinse off in the morning.

name: Clear Improvement™ Active Charcoal Mask
usage: Apply to clean skin. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse off with warm water. Use once a week or as needed.

name: AHA 30% + BHA 2% Peeling Solution
usage: Apply to clean, dry skin. Leave on for no more than 10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use once or twice a week.

name: The POREfessional Deep Retreat Pore-Clearing Clay Mask
usage: Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 30 minutes or until completely dry. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Rose Sugar Scrub
usage: Gently massage onto damp skin and rinse with warm water. Use 3–4 times a week.

name: Exfoliating Scrub
usage: Massage gently over damp skin, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly. Use 3–4 times a week.

name: Cookies N Clean Whipped Clay Detox Face Mask
usage: Apply an even layer to clean, damp skin. Leave on for 10–15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Clear Improvement™ Charcoal Honey Mask
usage: Apply to clean skin. Leave on for 10–15 minutes. Rinse off with warm water. Use once a week or as needed.

name: Foaming Face Scrub
usage: Apply to damp skin, gently massage in circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with water. Use 2–3 times per week.

name: Skin Resurfacing Peel
usage: Apply a thin layer to clean skin. Leave on for 10–15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use once or twice a week.

name: Ginseng Skin Hero Peeling
usage: Apply to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use once or twice a week.

name: Sugar Face Polish Exfoliator
usage: Gently massage onto damp skin and leave for 5–10 minutes. Rinse with warm water. Use 3–4 times per week.

name: Anti-Blemish Oil-Control Mask
usage: Apply a thin layer to clean skin. Leave on for 5 minutes and rinse with warm water.

name: Beautifeye Illuminating Eye Patches
usage: Apply under the eyes, leave for 20–30 minutes, then remove and gently pat the remaining serum into the skin.

name: Ground Rice & Honey Glow Mask
usage: Apply to clean skin. Leave for 10–15 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.

name: Out of Trouble™ 10 Minute Mask
usage: Apply to clean face. Leave on for 10 minutes, then remove with damp washcloth and rinse.

name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial
usage: Use once weekly. Apply evenly to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 20 minutes, then rinse with warm water.

name: Advanced Génifique Yeux Eye Cream
usage: Apply a small amount to the under-eye area morning and evening. Gently pat with your ring finger until absorbed.

name: Génifique Eye & Lash Concentrate
usage: Gently apply to cleansed eye area and lashes morning and night using the applicator.

name: 5% Caffeine Solution + EGCG
usage: Apply a small amount onto the eye contour in the morning and evening. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

name: CC Eye Clair
usage: Use in the morning. Apply by tapping gently to the under-eye area. Can be used as a concealer.

name: Revive Eye Serum Ginseng + Retinal
usage: Use nightly. Apply to clean under-eye area and gently pat with fingertips until fully absorbed.

name: C-Tango Multivitamin Eye Cream
usage: Gently pat a pump under and around the eyes morning and evening.

name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream
usage: Use morning and evening. Gently apply to eye area using ring finger.

name: Capture Totale C.E.L.L. Energy Eye Cream
usage: Apply daily to eye contour area using fingertips. Gently massage in.

name: Retinol Eye Cream
usage: Apply a small amount to cleansed eye area in the evening. Avoid use with other retinoids.

name: Moisture Surge Eye
usage: Use morning and night. Massage gently around the eyes until fully absorbed.

name: Lip Butter Balm
usage: Apply to clean lips throughout the day and before bed for lasting hydration.

name: Glaze Craze Tinted Lip Serum
usage: Apply evenly to lips. Use alone or over lipstick for a tinted glossy finish.

name: Lip Sleeping Mask
usage: Apply a generous layer before sleep. Leave on overnight and wipe off in the morning.

name: Honey Infused Lip Oil
usage: Apply directly to lips as needed. Can be used alone or over lipstick.

name: Plush Puddin’ Intensive Recovery Lip Mask
usage: Apply a generous amount to clean lips before bed. No need to rinse.

name: Tripeptide Plumping Lip Balm
usage: Apply throughout the day as needed for hydration and a fuller look.

name: Bouncy & Firm Lip Treatment
usage: Use daily or as needed. Apply with clean fingers for intensive care.

name: Lip Sleeping Mask
usage: Apply before sleep and leave on overnight. Can also be used during the day as a balm.

name: 101 Ointment Multipurpose Superbalm
usage: Use as needed on lips, cuticles, elbows or any dry skin. Highly concentrated.

name: Lux Balm
usage: Apply as needed throughout the day for instant moisture and softness.

name: Ascorbyl Glucoside Solution 12% - C Vitamini Serumu
usage: Apply a few drops to cleansed skin in the morning and/or evening. Use during the serum step of your skincare routine. Avoid the eye area. Follow with sunscreen if used in the morning.

name: Moisture Surge Active Glow Hydrating Face Serum
usage: Suitable for daily use. Apply after cleansing your face.
